text: Can we use an island multiple times on same page?
Then we don't need to define the ID, right?
No need to define the id. Our system will ensure each instance of the island has a unique id

:wave:  Hello All -

We've added a "Release Log" to our documentation home here <https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-js-building-block-examples/release-log.html>. As we iterate and move forward we will be updating this document with new changes. As always feedback is welcome :slightly_smiling_face: .

Thank you :thankyou: :sprocket: .
